package.name: german-accents
package.author: Puvendran Pillay
package.description: Include German Accents substitutions to espanso
package.title: German accents

manifest.author: Puvendran Pillay
manifest.description: Include German Accents substitutions to espanso
manifest.name: german-accents
manifest.title: German accents

value.readme:
A simple package to conveniently type german with a non-german keyboard layout.
It works by replacing keywords like `a"` with `ä`. More details below.

### Installation

Install the package with:

```
espanso install german-accents
```

### Usage

This package replaces the following keywords with the associated accent while you're
typing:

#### Lowercase Accents

Keyword | Replaced
--- | ---
`a"` | ä
`o"` | ö
`u"` | ü
`s"` | ß

#### Uppercase Accents

Keyword | Replaced
--- | ---
`A"` | Ä
`O"` | Ö
`U"` | Ü

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# German Accents

# Lowercase
matches:
  - trigger: "a\""
    replace: "ä"

  - trigger: "o\""
    replace: "ö"

  - trigger: "u\""
    replace: "ü"

  - trigger: "s\""
    replace: "ß"

# Uppercase

  - trigger: "A\""
    replace: "Ä"

  - trigger: "O\""
    replace: "Ö"

  - trigger: "U\""
    replace: "Ü"
